TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IToolboxUser

summary.span: 定义一个接口，此接口用于设置当前选定的工具箱项以及指示设计器是否支持特定的工具箱项。

span.span: Defines an interface for setting the currently selected toolbox item and indicating whether a designer supports a particular toolbox item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口提供到设计器工具箱支持功能。This interface provides toolbox support functions to designers. 方法指示是否指定可在当前设计器处于活动状态时。The method indicates whether the specified can be used when the current designer is active. 方法选择指定。The method selects the specified . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现可以限制对特定类型的支持的接口对象。The following code example demonstrates an implementation of the interface that can restrict support for specific types of objects. [!code-cpp[IToolboxUserExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IToolboxUserExample/CPP/samplecontrol.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IToolboxUserExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IToolboxUserExample/CS/samplecontrol.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IToolboxUserExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IToolboxUserExample/VB/samplecontrol.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool GetToolSupported(class System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem tool) cil managed
Public Function GetToolSupported (tool As ToolboxItem) As Boolean

param.name: tool
param.span: 要进行工具箱支持测试的 。

span.span: The to be tested for toolbox support.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示当前设计器是否支持指定工具。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the specified tool is supported by the current designer.

returns.span: 如果工具箱支持该工具而且该工具可启用，则为 ；如果该文档设计器不知道如何使用该工具，则为 。

span.span: if the tool is supported by the toolbox and can be enabled; if the document designer does not know how to use the tool.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的工具支持通过设计器实现接口，则在此设计器具有焦点时，将工具箱中启用该工具。If the specified tool is supported by the designer implementing the interface, then the tool will be enabled in the toolbox when this designer has focus. 否则，它将被禁用。Otherwise, it will be disabled. 后一种工具标记为已启用或禁用，它可能不支持同一设计器中再次测试。Once a tool is marked as enabled or disabled, it may not be tested for support with the same designer again. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现方法。The following code example demonstrates an implementation of the method. [!code-cpp[IToolboxUserExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IToolboxUserExample/CPP/samplecontrol.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[IToolboxUserExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IToolboxUserExample/CS/samplecontrol.cs#2)] [!code-vb[IToolboxUserExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IToolboxUserExample/VB/samplecontrol.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ToolPicked(class System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem tool) cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户双击工具箱项时调用。 is called when the user double-clicks on a toolbox item. 文档设计器应创建指定的工具的组件。The document designer should create a component for the specified tool. Visual Studio 集成的开发环境将仅调用在工具箱中启用的工具。The Visual Studio integrated development environment will only call on tools that are enabled in the toolbox.
